questions.text: What recent technological advancement do you think will have the biggest impact on education in the next 5 years?
Discuss one current environmental issue in Hong Kong and suggest possible solutions.
How has the COVID-19 pandemic changed the way we live and learn?
What are the benefits and risks of artificial intelligence in our daily lives?
Discuss the importance of mental health awareness among students.
How can Hong Kong promote STEM education to prepare students for future careers?
What is your opinion on the role of social media in spreading news and information?
Discuss the importance of cultural heritage preservation in modern society.
How can students contribute to building a more inclusive and diverse society?
What are the challenges and opportunities of online learning compared to traditional classroom learning?
